name: You Following Me? - Stop
description: Be safe and simultaneously support a great cause. Taken as a play on words from the infamous non-emergency 911 tapes played during the Zimmerman trial, the shirt boldly asks the question: "You following me?" to which the wearer answers "I don't need you to do that!" A portion of the proceeds for the sale of this shirt will go to the Trayvon Martin Foundation to “…create awareness of how violent crime impacts the families of the victims, and to provide support and advocacy for those families, in response to the murder of Trayvon Martin” (http://trayvonmartinfoundation.org, 2013). Gildan Ultra Cotton T-shirt - Black : 2 Color Front. All-Inclusive Price: Includes shipping to all 50 States, Canada & APO. Expect 2-3 weeks for delivery.
